title: Poster Antiqua
content:
I am trying to find this typeface used in the Hard Graft logo:

[http://www.hardgraft.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317151500/http:/www.hardgraft.com/ "http://www.hardgraft.com/")

Thanks!

Ed B

comments.content:
Caslon Graphique, with the spur of the g lopped off:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/caslon-graphique/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317151500/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/caslon-graphique/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/caslon-graphique/")
